subject: Human Growth Hormone
Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Eric Gagné, who was accused in the Mitchell report of purchasing human growth hormone in 2004, tackled the issue Monday the way a pitcher nibbles at the corners of the plate.
snippet: Eric Gagné, who was accused in the Mitchell report of purchasing human growth hormone in 2004, tackled the issue Monday the way a pitcher nibbles at the corners of the plate.
